std.c.windows.winsock



const uint FD_SETSIZE;
Default FD_SETSIZE value. In C/C++, it is redefinable by #define-ing the macro before #include-ing winsock.h. In D, use the function to allocate a of an arbitrary size.

fd_set* FD_CREATE(uint capacity);
Creates a new with the specified capacity.
